passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DAREDEVIL IMPULSE
                                Samira builds a combo by dealing damage with attacks or abilities against enemy champions unique from the previous one. Each one increases her Style from "E" to "S" grade 6 (total). Samira gains 4% (15% at max grade) Movement Speed per grade.Samira's attacks and abilities in milee range deal an additional 9 magic damage (6 + 3.5% ) increased to 17 magic damage (12+ 7% ) based on the target's missing health.Samira's attack against enemies affected by Immobilizing effects will dash her to her attack range. If the enemy is Knocked Up, she also keeps them Knocked Up for at least 0.5 seconds.
